hints.content:
$16{,} \green{5}90$ is composed of:
$1 \text{ ten thousand} + 6 \text{ thousands} + \green{5\text{ hundreds}} + 9\text{ tens}$.  

 We can use place value to express this in a different way.

$\green{5\text{ hundreds}}$ can be written as $\blue{4\text{ hundreds} + 1\text{ hundred}}$.

So, $\green{5\text{ hundreds}} + 9\text{ tens}$ can be regrouped this way:  

$\green{5\text{ hundreds}} + 9 \text{ tens}$  
$\begin{align}&=\blue{4\text{ hundreds} + 1\text{ hundred}} + 9\text{ tens}\\
&= 4 \text{ hundreds} + 10 \text{ tens} + 9\text{ tens}\\
&= 4 \text{ hundreds} + \purple{19} \text{ tens}.
\end{align}$

The other digits will not change.

|  | | | | | | |
- | :- | :-| :-| :-| :- | :-
$16{,}590$ | $=$ | $1\text{ ten thousand}$ | $+$| $6\text{ thousands}$ | $+$| $5\text{ hundreds}$ | $+$| $9\text{ tens}$
$16{,}590$ | $=$ | $1\text{ ten thousand}$ | $+$ | $6 \text{ thousands}$ | $+$|  $4\text{ hundreds}$ | $+$| $\maroonD{19\text{ tens}}$

question.content:
**Regroup to express the number in a different way.**

 |  | | | | | | |
- | :- | :-| :-| :-| :- | :-
$16{,}590$ | $=$ | $1\text{ ten thousand}$ | $+$| $6\text{ thousands}$ | $+$| $5\text{ hundreds}$ | $+$| $9\text{ tens}$
$16{,}590$ | $=$ | $1\text{ ten thousand}$ | $+$ | $6 \text{ thousands}$ | $+$|  $4\text{ hundreds}$ | $+$| [[â˜ƒ dropdown 1]]
